pkgmetadata.longdescription: Risk-Based Control Charts // Univariate and multivariate versions of risk-based control charts. Univariate versions of control charts, such as the risk-based version of X-bar, Moving Average (MA), Exponentially Weighted Moving Average Control Charts (EWMA), and Cumulative Sum Control Charts (CUSUM) charts. The risk-based version of the multivariate T2 control chart. Plot and summary functions. Kosztyan et. al. (2016) doi:10.1016/j.eswa.2016.06.019.
